name: Robot TimeBomb
description:
You're a robot that has for some reason a timebomb implanted into it's interals! will you reach the exit before the time runs out?

Made for the Mini-Jam 111: Colors²
Theme: Colors
Limitation: You are Your own Enemy.

Controls:

  • W & A key to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Shift to Sprint
  • ESC to Pause the game

I hope you enjoy the game!
